event.descr:
One of the monitored services is down due to a crash.

jmfcServiceName %parm[#1]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcServiceCrash trap received jmfcServiceName=%parm[#1]%

event.descr:
One of the monitored services is restarted.

jmfcServiceName %parm[#1]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcServiceUp trap received, Clearing Service Crash Alarm. jmfcServiceName=%parm[#1]%

event.descr: The system fan stopped functioning.
event.logmsg: jmfcFanFailure trap received

event.descr: Fan status is ok
event.logmsg: jmfcFanStatusOK trap received, Clearing Fan Failure Alarm.

event.descr: The system power supply failed.
event.logmsg: jmfcPowerSupplyFailure trap received

event.descr: The system power supply is restored.
event.logmsg: jmfcPowerSupplyOk trap received, Clearing Power Supply Alarm.

event.descr:
Cache Hit Ratio is low.

jmfcCacheHitRatio %parm[#1]%;

jmfcCacheHitRatioErrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcCacheHitRatioLow trap received jmfcCacheHitRatio=%parm[#1]% jmfcCacheHitRatioErrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
Cache Hit Ratio is normal.

jmfcCacheHitRatio %parm[#1]%;

jmfcCacheHitRatioClrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcCacheHitRatioOk trap received, Clearing Cache Hit Ratio Low Alarm. jmfcCacheHitRatio=%parm[#1]% jmfcCacheHitRatioClrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The aggregate CPU utilization across all CPUs is high.

jmfcCpuUtil %parm[#1]%;

jmfcCpuUtilErrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcCpuUtilHigh trap received jmfcCpuUtil=%parm[#1]% jmfcCpuUtilErrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The aggregate CPU utilization across all CPUs has fallen back to normal.

jmfcCpuUtil %parm[#1]%;

jmfcCpuUtilClrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcCpuUtilOk trap received, Clearing CPU Utilization High Alarm. jmfcCpuUtil=%parm[#1]% jmfcCpuUtilClrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
Free disk space is low.

jmfcDiskName %parm[#1]%;

jmfcDiskFreeSpace %parm[#2]%;

jmfcDiskSpaceErrThreshold %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcDiskSpaceLow trap received jmfcDiskName=%parm[#1]% jmfcDiskFreeSpace=%parm[#2]% jmfcDiskSpaceErrThreshold=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
Free disk space is normal.

jmfcDiskName %parm[#1]%;

jmfcDiskFreeSpace %parm[#2]%;

jmfcDiskSpaceClrThreshold %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcDiskSpaceOk trap received, Clearing Disk Space Alarm. jmfcDiskName=%parm[#1]% jmfcDiskFreeSpace=%parm[#2]% jmfcDiskSpaceClrThreshold=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
Memory utilization on the system is high.

jmfcMemUtil %parm[#1]%;

jmfcMemUtilErrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcMemUtilizationHigh trap received jmfcMemUtil=%parm[#1]% jmfcMemUtilErrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
Memory utilization on the system has come down to normal level.

jmfcMemUtil %parm[#1]%;

jmfcMemUtilClrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcMemUtilizationOk trap received, Clearing High Memory Utilization Alarm. jmfcMemUtil=%parm[#1]% jmfcMemUtilClrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
Network utilization on the system is high.

jmfcNetIntfUtilCurrent %parm[#1]%;

jmfcNetIntfUtilErrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcNetUtilizationHigh trap received jmfcNetIntfUtilCurrent=%parm[#1]% jmfcNetIntfUtilErrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
Network utilization on the system has come down to normal level.

jmfcNetIntfUtilCurrent %parm[#1]%;

jmfcNetIntfUtilClrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcNetUtilizationOk trap received, Clearing Net Utilization High Alarm. jmfcNetIntfUtilCurrent=%parm[#1]% jmfcNetIntfUtilClrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
Disk I/O on the system is high.

jmfcDiskName %parm[#1]%;

jmfcDiskIORate %parm[#2]%;

jmfcDiskIORateErrThreshold %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcDiskIOHigh trap received jmfcDiskName=%parm[#1]% jmfcDiskIORate=%parm[#2]% jmfcDiskIORateErrThreshold=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
Disk I/O on the system has come down to normal level.

jmfcDiskName %parm[#1]%;

jmfcDiskIORate %parm[#2]%;

jmfcDiskIORateClrThreshold %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcDiskIOOk trap received, Clearing Disk IO High Alarm. jmfcDiskName=%parm[#1]% jmfcDiskIORate=%parm[#2]% jmfcDiskIORateClrThreshold=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
One of the nodes in the cluster is down.

jmfcClusterNamespace %parm[#1]%;

jmfcClusterInstance %parm[#2]%;

jmfcNodeName %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcOriginNodeDown trap received jmfcClusterNamespace=%parm[#1]% jmfcClusterInstance=%parm[#2]% jmfcNodeName=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
One of the failed nodes in the cluster is up, Clearing Origin Node Down Alarm.

jmfcClusterNamespace %parm[#1]%;

jmfcClusterInstance %parm[#2]%;

jmfcNodeName %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcOriginNodeUp trap received jmfcClusterNamespace=%parm[#1]% jmfcClusterInstance=%parm[#2]% jmfcNodeName=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
CPU utilization of core HTTP Engine is high.

jmfcAppMaxCpuUtil %parm[#1]%;

jmfcAppMaxCpuUtilErrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcApplCpuUtilHigh trap received jmfcAppMaxCpuUtil=%parm[#1]% jmfcAppMaxCpuUtilErrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
CPU utilization of core HTTP Engine has fallen back to normal.

jmfcAppMaxCpuUtil %parm[#1]%;

jmfcAppMaxCpuUtilClrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcApplCpuUtilOk trap received, Clearing App. Utilization High Alarm. jmfcAppMaxCpuUtil=%parm[#1]% jmfcAppMaxCpuUtilClrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The Cache Bandwidth usage is high.

jmfcCacheBw %parm[#1]%;

jmfcCacheBwErrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcCacheBandwidthUsageHigh trap received jmfcCacheBw=%parm[#1]% jmfcCacheBwErrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The Cache Bandwith usage has come down within normal limits.

jmfcCacheBw %parm[#1]%;

jmfcCacheBwClrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcCacheBandwidthUsageOk trap received, Clearing Cache Bandwidth Usage High Alarm. jmfcCacheBw=%parm[#1]% jmfcCacheBwClrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The Origin Bandwidth usage is high.

jmfcOriginBw %parm[#1]%;

jmfcOriginBwErrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcOriginBandwidthUsageHigh trap received jmfcOriginBw=%parm[#1]% jmfcOriginBwErrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The Origin Bandwith usage has come down within normal limits.

jmfcOriginBw %parm[#1]%;

jmfcOriginBwClrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcOriginBandwidthUsageOk trap received, Clearing Origin Bandwidth Usage High Alarm. jmfcOriginBw=%parm[#1]% jmfcOriginBwClrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The Disk Bandwidth usage is high.

jmfcDiskName %parm[#1]%;

jmfcDiskBW %parm[#2]%;

jmfcDiskBWErrThreshold %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcDiskBandwidthUsageHigh trap received jmfcDiskName=%parm[#1]% jmfcDiskBW=%parm[#2]% jmfcDiskBWErrThreshold=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The Disk Bandwith usage has come down within normal limits.

jmfcDiskName %parm[#1]%;

jmfcDiskBW %parm[#2]%;

jmfcDiskBWClrThreshold %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcDiskBandwidthUsageOk trap received, Clearing Disk Bandwidth Usage High Alarm. jmfcDiskName=%parm[#1]% jmfcDiskBW=%parm[#2]% jmfcDiskBWClrThreshold=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The Connection Rate is high.

jmfcConnectionRateCurrent %parm[#1]%;

jmfcConnectionRateErrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcConnectionRateHigh trap received jmfcConnectionRateCurrent=%parm[#1]% jmfcConnectionRateErrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The Connection Rate has come down within normal limits.

jmfcConnectionRateCurrent %parm[#1]%;

jmfcConnectionRateClrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcConnectionRateOk trap received, Clearing Connection Rate High Alarm. jmfcConnectionRateCurrent=%parm[#1]% jmfcConnectionRateClrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The HTTP transaction Rate is high.

jmfcTransactionRateCurrent %parm[#1]%;

jmfcTransactionRateErrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcTransactionRateHigh trap received jmfcTransactionRateCurrent=%parm[#1]% jmfcTransactionRateErrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The HTTP transaction Rate has come down within normal limits.

jmfcTransactionRateCurrent %parm[#1]%;

jmfcTransactionRateClrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcTransactionRateOk trap received, Clearing Transaction Rate High Alarm. jmfcTransactionRateCurrent=%parm[#1]% jmfcTransactionRateClrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The Paging activity is high.

jmfcPagingCurrent %parm[#1]%;

jmfcPagingErrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcPagingHigh trap received jmfcPagingCurrent=%parm[#1]% jmfcPagingErrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The Paging activity has come down to normal level.

jmfcPagingCurrent %parm[#1]%;

jmfcPagingClrThreshold %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcPagingOk trap received, Clearing Paging High Alarm. jmfcPagingCurrent=%parm[#1]% jmfcPagingClrThreshold=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
The usage of a resource pool has exceeded its defined upper limit

jmfcResourcePoolName %parm[#1]%;

jmfcResourcePoolBandwidth %parm[#2]%;

jmfcResourcePoolActiveConns %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcResourcePoolUsageHigh trap received jmfcResourcePoolName=%parm[#1]% jmfcResourcePoolBandwidth=%parm[#2]% jmfcResourcePoolActiveConns=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The usage of a resource pool has fallen back to its normal limit

jmfcResourcePoolName %parm[#1]%;

jmfcResourcePoolBandwidth %parm[#2]%;

jmfcResourcePoolActiveConns %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcResourcePoolHighUsageOK trap received, Clearing Resource Pool usage High Alarm. jmfcResourcePoolName=%parm[#1]% jmfcResourcePoolBandwidth=%parm[#2]% jmfcResourcePoolActiveConns=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The usage of a resource pool has fallen lower than its defined lower limit

jmfcResourcePoolName %parm[#1]%;

jmfcResourcePoolBandwidth %parm[#2]%;

jmfcResourcePoolActiveConns %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcResourcePoolUsageLow trap received jmfcResourcePoolName=%parm[#1]% jmfcResourcePoolBandwidth=%parm[#2]% jmfcResourcePoolActiveConns=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The usage of a resource pool has come up to its normal limit

jmfcResourcePoolName %parm[#1]%;

jmfcResourcePoolBandwidth %parm[#2]%;

jmfcResourcePoolActiveConns %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcResourcePoolLowUsageOK trap received, Clearing Resource Pool Usage Low Alarm. jmfcResourcePoolName=%parm[#1]% jmfcResourcePoolBandwidth=%parm[#2]% jmfcResourcePoolActiveConns=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
One of the services managed by PM has exited unexpectedly, but did not left a core file.

jmfcServiceName %parm[#1]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcServiceExit trap received jmfcServiceName=%parm[#1]%

event.descr:
Process Manager has detected that a process has hung and will now perform its restart action

jmfcServiceName %parm[#1]%;
event.logmsg: jmfcServiceLivenessFailure trap received jmfcServiceName=%parm[#1]%

event.descr: SMART has sent an event about a possible disk error
event.logmsg: jmfcSmartError trap received

event.descr: The system has shut down unexpectedly
event.logmsg: jmfcUnexpectedShutdown trap received

event.descr: A test trap ordered by the system administrator
event.logmsg: jmfcTestTrap trap received
